Html:
Currently there are 19 filters available in the drop-down list, however the selection tree enforces only one change at a time.  What I mean by this is if I wanted to turn off every filter except Crafted items I would have to uncheck 18 filters to leave only Crafted checked.  The drop-down list would be better served as a pop-up window where selections can be made and then applied all at once.  Since there are so many selections it would also be nice to have a check-all/uncheck-all option.
Thank you.
Indeed, we're planning a revamp to the filtering system too. More details to come later.
I agree with this... a huge bummer when playing with the filter list... check-all/uncheck-all would solve it.  TY!
